message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'd like to propose $11,500. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.
